response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market rate, making it an attractive opportunity for you. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction and excellent post-purchase support. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
